title: Sterling and Wilson Renewable Energy bags orders worth Rs 328 cr
description: Sterling and Wilson Renewable Energy secured a contract to build a 1,000 MWh standalone battery energy storage system (BESS) in Rajasthan and a 20 MW floating solar project in Karnataka. The total project value is Rs 328 crore. The BESS project will be India's largest and is slated for completion by 2025.
